MOOLAIDGKPO: Blessing of the Welkin Moon can be purchased multiple times
NFDFFCLBMJD: About Blessing of the Welkin Moon
GOKKJEIIDFD:
<color=#D3BC8EFF>Blessing of the Welkin Moon</color>
Each time you purchase Blessing of the Welkin Moon, you will immediately receive 300 Genesis Crystals and 30 days of the Blessing.
During this 30-day period, you can claim 90 Primogems each day when you log in. (Refreshes daily at 4:00 AM (GMT+8))

<color=#D3BC8EFF>Important Points</color>
1. The duration of the Blessing of the Welkin Moon can only be extended if its remaining duration is 180 days or less.
2. You cannot purchase an additional blessing if your remaining duration exceeds 180 days. If unique circumstances result in a repeat purchase anyway, the duration will not be extended, and instead you will be refunded 330 Genesis Crystals directly.
3. There will be no refund for any Primogems that are not claimed via login during the Blessing's duration.
